playerClasses.name: Magma Human
playerClasses.description: A human who ate a devil fruit, granting the user a body of magma.

special_attacks.name: Magma Punch
special_attacks.description: Unleash a powerful punch infused with magma energy.

special_attacks.name: Volcanic Eruption
special_attacks.description: Summon a volcanic eruption to engulf the enemy in flames.

playerClasses.name: Rubber Human
playerClasses.description: A human who ate a devil fruit granting the user a body of rubber, to fight as one pleases.

special_attacks.name: Elastic Force Punch
special_attacks.description: Stretch your body to deliver a powerful elastic punch.

special_attacks.name: Giant Fist
special_attacks.description: Inflate your fist to the size of a Giant's hand, and punch your foe with the force of a thousand gunships

playerClasses.name: Bomb Human
playerClasses.description: A human who ate a devil fruit to make bombs out of anything.

special_attacks.name: Explosive Barrage
special_attacks.description: Unleash a barrage of explosive projectiles at the enemy.

special_attacks.name: Amplified Bomb Blast
special_attacks.description: For some reason, you pull out a ballistic missile and imbue it with your power. It does more damage.

enemies.name: Marauder
enemies.description: Pirates doomed to roam the seas, attacking all who cross their path. They're skilled in combat and can curse their opponents.

abilities.name: Cutlass Swipe
abilities.description: A swift, powerful strike with a cutlass.

abilities.name: Point Blank
abilities.description: A close-range shot from a flintlock pistol.

abilities.name: Red Blast
abilities.description: An explosive attack using a small handheld cannon.

bosses.name: Pirate Captain
bosses.description: A legendary pirate captain turned into a fearsome undead monstrosity. He commands dark powers and a crew of ghostly pirates.

abilities.name: Cannon Barrage
abilities.description: Unleashes a devastating barrage from the ship's cannons.

abilities.name: Iron Hook Grapple
abilities.description: A vicious melee attack with a sharp iron hook.

abilities.name: Night Slash
abilities.description: Attacks with a dark force, causing 25 damage.
